Headline: #151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan & 156 LaSalle buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Belmont, Addison & Halsted; SB Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Belmont, Addison and Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Western. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
